captions.text:
NOW MANEUVER YOUR LIPS
THROUGH THE ANXIETY FIELD

TOWARDS JENNY'S FACE.
GO LEFT, LEFT!

USE THE BREATH MINT!
IT'S GONNA BOOST
YOUR CONFIDENCE!

I CAN KISS JENNY
ON MY OWN, TRUST ME.

WE WERE JUST BETA-TESTING
KI'S NEW VIDEO GAME.

IT'S A HIGH SCHOOL
VIDEO GAME.

VIDEO GAME HIGH SCHOOL'S
VIDEO GAME.
SMALL PART WITH YOU IN IT.

KI, I CAN'T GET
PAST THE FLAG POLE.

HEY, SO DO YOU WANT TO GET
SOME LUNCH SOMETIME?

- WE SHOULD HANG OUT
MORE OFTEN.
- UM, OKAY.

HEY, UH, WANT TO PLAY
THE PART OF THE VIDEOGAME
WHERE I'M MAKING OUT WITH KI?

THE ST. CATHERINE
GIRLS ACADEMY PUNISHERS
IN LAST NIGHT'S MATCH.

THAT MAKES
THREE WINS IN A ROW

FOR THE LITTLE J.V. TEAM
THAT COULD.

I TELL YOU WHAT, SHOTTY, IF
ME AND THE OLD BALL AND CHAIN

HAD HALF THE CHEMISTRY
AS THESE TWO,

I WOULDN'T BE SLEEPING
ON THE COUCH.

OR DRUNK
AT TEN IN THE MORNING!

HA HA! YOU SHOULDN'T
SAY THAT AGAIN!

YES, WELL, IT'S CRUNCH TIME,
SO MOTHER IS WIRED IN,

BUT FATHER COULD NEVER RESIST
A GOOD PARENTS' DAY.

UH, YEAH, WHEN IS
YOUR DAD COMING IN?

DUDE, KI'S DAD IS COMING
IN, LIKE, 30 MINUTES.

YES, TAHT'S RIGHT,
AND YOU TWO ARE BOTH INVITED.

ESPECIALLY YOU, JENNY.
YOU'RE MY COOL FRIEND.
LET ME JUST GO GET CLEANED UP,

BECAUSE SOMEBODY
GOT PAINT ALL OVER ME.

YEAH, WELL, UH,
IT PAINTS ONE
TO KNOW ONE.

WOW, YOU JUST SAID THAT,
AND WE ALL HEARD.

OR SHOULD I SAY,
"C AT LESS THAN
LESS THAN OPEN QUOTES.

TED, YOU LEARNED C++,
KIND OF.

OH, YES.
I KNOW MY ACCENT SUCKS,

BUT I REALLY WANT
TO IMPRESS YOUR DAD,

SO I'M BRINGIN' OUT
THE BIG GUNS:

MY K-POP LOOKS,
MY J-POP CHARM,

AND MY BIG, HONKIN'
SMART GUY BRAIN.

( sighs ) COME ON.
COME ON, COME ON, COME ON.

DID YOU JUST GIVE
YOUR DAD $5,000?

NO BIG, JUST SMART
AND RESPONSIBLE TED
TED, HE PAYS YOU CHILD SUPPORT.

DON'T MEAN TO MAKE YOU
SOUND SUPER DUMB,

BUT THAT WOULD BE CALLED
FATHER SUPPORT.

OH, MY GOD, GUYS,
I'M SUPER DUMB.

JENNY.
I GOT SOME GOOD NEWS.

THE PTA IS GIVING ME
THIS PARENT OF THE YEAR
THING IN THE MORNING.

THE BRUNCH IS AT TEN,
AND THEN YOU GIVE
A SPEECH AT 11:30.

JUST, LIKE, A PAGE,
ABOUT HOW I'M A GREAT MOM.

I'M NOT STAYING UP ALL NIGHT
WRITING A SPEECH ABOUT YOU.

JENNY,
THIS IS IMPORTANT TO ME.

AS IN THE HEAD OF
THE NATIONAL FPS LEAGUE,

YEAH, I KNOW
WHO SHE IS, OKAY?
I JUST...

I DON'T REALLY FEEL
LIKE TALKING ABOUT YOU
WELL, IT SUCKS TO BE YOU.

CAN'T WAIT
TO HEAR THAT SPEECH.

OKAY.
I THINK I GOT IT.

- EACH PLAYER STARTS
WITH FIVE CARDS.
- FOUR CARDS.

- D'OH! I'M NEVER GONNA
LEARN THIS GAME IN TIME!

YOU'RE JUST... CURIOUS
ABOUT THE WORLD.

BRIAN, AM I JUST
CURIOUS ABOUT THE WORLD?

WHAT? NO, TED, YOU'RE NOT
AN IDIOT. YOU'RE JUST, UH...
OKAY, UH, GUYS, I GOTTA GO.

WAIT. BRIAN, YOU'RE
MY BACKUP COOL FRIEND.

I'M SORRY, KI.
I'LL MEET YOUR DAD TOMORROW.

OH! WHAT HE SAID!
I'M OUTTIE!

TED, MY DAD'S GONNA
BE HERE ANY SECOND!

EXACTLY. I CAN'T LET HIM
SEE THAT HIS DAUGHTER
IS DATING A BIG, DUMB IDIOT.
OUT OF THE WAY, OLD MAN!

SWAN'S THE NAME.
KEN SWAN. I'M KI'S FATHER.

YOU HAD ME SWEATING
FOR A MINUTE THERE, KIWI.

CAN WE PLAY ANOTHER GAME?
I HAVE A REALLY GREAT WAGER.

OH, SORRY, I HAVE
CLASS TOMORROW.

HONEY, YOUR MOTHER
AND I HAD A TALK, KI,

AND WE DON'T THINK
THIS SCHOOL IS
GOOD FOR YOU.

BEG YOUR PARDON?
ON WHAT GROUNDS?

WE PLAYED THE GAME
YOU SENT HOME.

HIGH SCHOOL VIDEO GAME,
WAS IT? NOT YOUR BEST WORK.

QUITE A BIT OF VIOLENCE
AND KISSING,
AND MORE THAN A FEW BUGS.

I'M LEARNING SO MUCH.
I'M BECOMING A BETTER DESIGNER.

The Law: NO, YOU'RE NOT.
YOUR NEW GAME SUCKS.

YOU HEARD
THAT SAD CHILD, HONEY.

ARTICLE 44, SECTION G
OF THE SWAN FAMILY
CONTRACT STATES,

"IF KI FEELS HER
PARENTS ARE BEING
MEAN AND UNREASONABLE,

YOU HAVE 12 HOURS
TO PREP YOUR CASE.

MY DAD
SENT A CARE PACKAGE.

UH, HE CAME LAST YEAR,
BUT MY MOM'S HERE THIS YEAR,

AND THEY DON'T REALLY
HANG, SO...

WELL, I LOST MY DAD
WHEN I WAS 3,

SO, UH, WHAT DID YOU
HAVE TO WRITE A SPEECH
ABOUT YOUR MOM FOR?

OH, YEAH, SHE'S WINNING
MOTHER OF THE YEAR,

AND I'M SUPPOSED
TO INTRODUCE HER,

DO YOU WANT TO SEE
WHAT I HAVE SO FAR?

"WHAT CAN I SAY ABOUT
THE INCREDIBLE MARY MATRIX?"

THAT'S IT. THAT'S...
ALL I GOT.

BUT ARE YOU-- IF YOU'RE
ASKING ME FOR MY ADVICE,

I WOULD PROBABLY
START OFF, LIKE,

TELLING A JOKE
AND THEN MAYBE SEGUE

I DON'T REALLY HAVE
ANYTHING LIKE THAT.

WELL, SURE YOU DO.
I MEAN...

YOU KNOW, LIKE FOND MEMORIES
WITH YOUR MOM, YOU KNOW,

LIKE, UH, BIRTHDAY PARTIES
OR GRADUATION,

LIKE CUTE MOTHER-DAUGHTER
KIND OF STUFF, UM...

YOU KNOW, JUST
TO SAY SOMETHING NICE
ABOUT YOUR MOM.

I MEAN, I CAN'T
THINK OF ANYTHING.
I DON'T--

I DON'T HAVE
ANYTHING TO SAY
ABOUT MY MOM.

THANKS FOR LISTENING TO
MY CRAP LAST NIGHT.

Mary Matrix:
JEEZ, IT'S 10:15.
THE BRUNCH IS--

HEY, BRIAN, DON'T YOU HAVE
SOME TABLES TO WAIT ON?

OH, CRAP. CALHOUN'S
GONNA KILL ME.

I MUST SAY,
YOUR PROFESSOR LAYTON

HAS NO UNDERSTANDING
OF WHERE THE PUZZLE GENRE

FITS INTO CAILLOIS'
FOUR CATEGORIES OF PLAY.

THEY TEACH YOU TO PLAY
GAMES HERE, FATHER.

CLEARLY. HAVE YOU
LEARNED ANYTHING HERE?

EXCEPT FOR FREDDIE'S CLASS,
BUT I DROPPED THAT ONE.

THIS IS WHERE I SCHEDULE
ACTIVITIES AND CHORES

WENDELL! DID YOU
CLEAN THE BATHROOM?

WITH ALL THIS MIDDLE
MANAGEMENT WORK,

I HOPE YOU'RE STILL
FINDING THE TIME

I FLEX MY WAY
AROUND CREATIVE
CHALLENGES ALL THE TIME.

- SHANE!
- I'M A BUSY MAN, KI!

WHAT DID YOU THINK OF
MY CREATIVE IDEAS FOR--

I THINK I DON'T CARE
ABOUT YOU, YOUR JOB,

BUT I SAVED THE MOST
POSITIVE REINFORCEMENT

OF THE IDEA OF WHY
THIS SCHOOL IS REALLY
GREAT FOR ME

AND WHY I SHOULD
STAY HERE FOR LAST--

AND WHY ARE YOUR
ASSAULT PLAYERS
USING ACOG SCOPES?

IN MY DAY, ALL WE NEEDED
WAS A SIMPLE FOREGRIP.

COUNTESS KELLY,
MAY I PRESENT MY DAUGTHER,

A GOOD VARSITY CAPTAIN
SHOULD ALWAYS BE
PUNCTUAL, JENNY,

AND BARRING THAT
THEY SHOULD BE ABLE
TO MANUFACTURE

YEAH, I WAS UP
ALL NIGHT WITH A FRIEND

WRITING A SPEECH
ABOUT MY WONDERFUL MOTHER.

WE LOST TRACK OF TIME,
HE AND I.

AM I TO UNDERSTAND
YOU'RE LATE FOR BRUNCH

BECAUSE YOU HAD A BOY
IN YOUR ROOM ALL NIGHT?

Calhoun: I AM HUNGRY!
WHERE'S BRIAN?

NOW, JENNY, WHY DON'T YOU
TELL US ABOUT THIS
BOY FRIEND OF YOURS

MY NAME IS BRIAN.
I WILL BE YOUR SERVER TODAY.

ABOUT RESPECTING THE PEOPLE
YOU'VE HURT IN THE PAST?

I'M THE BEST VERSION OF YOU
THAT EVER EXISTED.

THE CHUBBY DILLWEED
EVERY CREW JOCK

USED TO WEDGIE INTO THEIR
LOCKERS IN MIDDLE SCHOOL.
NEVER SAY THAT NAME TO ME!

OKAY, JEEZ.
SWITCH TO DECAF,
KEMOSABE.

WHICH IS WHY YOU MUST
REMAIN FOCUSED.

A VARSITY CAPTAIN
KEEPS HER SKILLS LEET

SO SHE CAN PRACTICE,
PRACTICE, PRACTICE.

ESPECIALLY WHEN SHE ONLY
RECEIVED HER STATION

AND THE UPRUPT MELTDOWN
OF HER EX-BOYFRIEND,

WHICH LEADS ME
BACK TO MY POINT:

I AGREE. IF I EVER CAUGHT
TWO OF MY PLAYERS DATING,

I WOULD BENCH THEM BOTH
FOR THE REST OF THE SEASON.
I DO, AND I LIKE IT.

I'D EXPECT FROM PARENT
OF THE YEAR.

ERNIE! IS THAT
A BACON CHEESEBURGER?

I DIDN'T EVEN--
I DIDN'T EVEN ORDER THIS!

I'M SORRY. I WILL
FIX THIS IMMEDIATELY.

AND MY PERSONAL LIFE
IS NONE OF YOUR BUSINESS.

WE ARE NOT TALKING
ABOUT THIS RIGHT NOW.

YEAH, WE ARE.
YOU CAN'T JUST WALTZ
BACK INTO MY LIFE--

YES, I CAN.
I'M YOUR MOTHER.

WILL SOMEONE GET
THAT MAN A TUNA?

WELL, SORRY IF I APPEARED
SO DUMB BEFORE, KENNETH.

MAY I FETCH YOU
A PIZZA DUNKS?

I'LL JUST HAVE
SOME WATER, THANKS.

AH, A WATER MAN!
FINE TASTE.

I ADMIRE A DAD WITH
A SOPHISTICATED PHALLUS.

LET'S JUST GET DOWN
TO BRASS TACKS.

YOUR PARENTS MUST THINK
VERY HIGHLY OF YOU!

NO, THANK YOU,
I ALREADY ATE.

DO YOU TWO GET UP
TO MUCH KISSING?

LET'S GET BACK
TO THOSE BRASS TAXES.

I MEAN,
DO WE REALLY NEED THEM?

LET'S DISCUSS
WHAT YOU DO KNOW

AND EVERY SUNDAY
WE GET UP EXTRA EARLY

AND MAKE THOSE LITTLE
PANCAKE BALLS.

THEY'RE SO CUTE.
WHAT ARE THEY CALLED
AGAIN, KI?

AND WE USED TO MAKE THEM
EVERY SUNDA MORNING,
I'VE SEEN ALL I NEED TO SEE.

IT WAS VERY NICE
TO MEET YOU.

YOU STAY UP LATE,
YOU EAT JUNK FOOD,

YOU'RE DROPPING CLASSES,
WHICH DOESN'T SEEM TO MATTER,

BUT WORST OF ALL,
YOUR ART IS SUFFERING.

THE LESS SAID
ABOUT TED THE BETTER.

I DON'T SEE HIDE
NOR HAIR OF THEM.

IS SOMEONE HAVING
IMAGINARY FRIENDS AGAIN?

I AM NOT! THEY ARE
REAL AND WONDERFUL,

I'M SORRY THAT YOU
FEEL THAT WAY,

BUT YOU ASKED
FOR A PERFORMANCE REVIEW,

YOU KNOW, I DON'T THINK
THERE'S ENOUGH ICE CREAM

IN THE ENTIRE WORLD
TO DEAL WITH THAT BUNCH.

BUT... I DID FIND
A PIECE OF GUM.
BUT WE HAVE TO SPLIT IT,

'CAUSE I'VE HAD
A PRETTY ROUGH DAY MYSELF.

I'LL GIVE YOU
A THOUSAND BUCKS TO GIVE
THIS SPEECH FOR ME.
AND YOU HAVE TO DO THIS.

OKAY. WELL, I HAVE
TO GET BACK TO WORK.

I WANTED TO APOLOGIZE
FOR EARLIER.

I DOWNLOADED SOME
SWELL GREGORIAN CHANTS
FOR THE RIDE HOME.

( Ken sings along
with Gregorian chant )

FATHER, DO YOU MIND
IF WE PLAY THAT LAST
GAME OF POKERMON

HONEY, WHY DELAY
THE INEVITABLE?
I ALWAYS WIN.

BUT IF I WIN,
I STAY AT VGHS.

IF YOU WIN,
WHICH YOU WON'T,

I'LL DO THE DISHES
ON WEDNESDAY NIGHTS.

NO ONE CAN BEAT THE LAW
EXCEPT THE LAW!
HA HA HA HA HA HA!

OH, DUDE, LAW!
PUT SOME PANTS ON, MAN!

WHAT CAN I SAY ABOUT
THE GREAT MARY MATRIX?

UM, WELL, STAY AWAY FROM
HER MEATLOAF, FOR ONE.

YOU'VE ALL HEARD
OF MARY MATRIX.

SOME OF YOU
MIGHT EVEN KNOW HER,

BUT I'M THE ONLY ONE
WHO GETS TO CALL HER MOM.

RIGHT FROM THE BEGINNING,
I WANTED TO BE MY MOM.

AND SHE WAS EIGHT MONTHS
PREGNANT WITH ME.

I'VE SEEN THE CLIPS, MOM,
YOU WERE HUGE.

IT'S THE FINAL ROUND.
THERE'S FOUR MINUTES
LEFT IN THE GAME

AND HER TEAM'S DOWN
BY FIVE POINTS,

AND SHE GOES INTO LABOR,
BUT YOU DIDN'T STOP.

YOU JUST KEPT PLAYING, AND YOU
BROUGHT YOUR TEAM A MIRACLE.

THE WILDCATS
WON BY THREE POINTS.

AND THEN YOU HAD ME
RIGHT THERE IN THE ARENA.

I DIDN'T EVEN GIVE YOU TIME
TO GET TO THE HOSPITAL.

I JUST WANTED
TO MEET YOU SO BAD:

THE BOSTON BANSHEE,
THE SIREN OF DEATH.

TWENTY-TWO YEARS OLD,
AND FIVE CHAMPIONSHIP TITLES.

SORRY I ALMOST
LOST YOU YOUR SIXTH.

WHILE YOU WERE AWAY, DAD AND I,
WE WOULD WATCH EVERY GAME,

YOUR COMMITMENT TO THE GAME
LEFT ME IN AWE,

SO WHEN I STARTED PLAYING,
I TOOK YOUR HANDLE:

BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T
JUST MY MOM,

WELL, YOU ALL KNOW
THE REST OF THE STORY:

SO IT IS MY HONOR
TO PRESENT MARY MATRIX

WITH THE PTA'S PARENT
OF THE YEAR AWARD.

THANK YOU.
THANK YOU VERY MUCH.

WELL, HONEY,
HERE WE ARE AGAIN.

MR. SWAN, I THINK WE GOT OFF
ON THE WRONG FOOT.

TED, WHAT WOULD YOU DO
IF I HAD TO GO HOME
FOR A WHILE?

OH, I-I DON'T KNOW. I MEAN,
I'D MISS YOU A WHOLE BUNCH,

I'D BE REALLY SAD, BUT IF YOU
REALLY HAD TO LEAVE,

YOU WIN, BUT I'M
CALLING YOUR BLUFF.

IF TED IS MATURE ENOUGH
TO LET ME LEAVE,

THIS IS ABOUT ME
GROWING UP WITHOUT YOU.

I'M SORRY, DAD,
BUT I'M CALLING YOUR BLUFF.

I'LL BET
YOU DIDN'T EXPECT THAT.

BUT I DIDN'T
EXPECT IT SO SOON.

- I LOVE YOU.
- I LOVE YOU TOO, KIWI.

UM, WOULD IT BE OKAY
IF ME AND KI

title: Video Game High School (VGHS) - S2, Ep. 3
